altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

title.en: Asa no Tsuukin Densha de, Yatara to Hanashikakete Kuru Joshikousei.

altTitles.es-la: Una chica de preparatoria que me habla mucho en el tren de la mañana camino al trabajo

altTitles.ja: 朝の通勤電車で、やたらと話しかけてくる女子高生。

altTitles.en: The High School Girl Who Randomly Talks to Me on the Morning Commuter Train.

description.en: I hate going to the office in the morning, and having to commute on a crowded train makes it even worse! What if you could relieve the morning blues, even if only a little? This is an encounter with a sunny gal, for all the working stiffs who feel like they are stuck on their morning commute!
description.es-la: La cosa que más odio en el mundo: ¡viajar al trabajo en tren! Ya de por sí odio ir a la oficina, ¡así que tener que hacerlo en tren es lo peor! ¿Pero qué pasaría si esa melancolía matutina pudiera desaparecer un poco? Un regalo para todos los trabajadores a los que el viaje en tren les agobia: ¡una chica «gyaru» exclusiva de las mañanas!

altTitles.ja: 吸血! 黒魔城

description.en: Seventeen year old Aya is the perfect high school student. Good grades, popular and sports prodigy. She is looking forward to summer break as her pen pal has invited her to his family ranch, but one day on the way home from school she hears a voice calling her name from....

altTitles.ja: 屋根裏部屋の公爵夫人

description.en: The new life of Duchess Opal all started from a dusty attic. The house she resided in after a political marriage with the young Duke, Hubert, was full of hostility. There was also a woman named "Angel," who is treasured by the mansion's owner... Opal gained a bad reputation because of a disgraceful rumor and as a result, she was treated like a hindrance. However, the Duchess doesn't like losing, so it won't end like this! The woman is unrelated to the management of the territory. I will outwit those who let their guard down…!
description.ja: 若き公爵、ヒューバートとの政略結婚で住むことになった邸は敵意に満ち、そして邸の者に大切にされている『天使』と呼ばれる女性がいた…いわれのない不名誉な噂のせいで悪評の的にされ、邪魔者扱いされるオパールだったが、負けず嫌いな公爵夫人はこのままじゃ終わらない！女は領地経営と無縁。そう油断する者たちを出し抜いていく……！！オパールの未来は明るいものになるのか―

altTitles.fr: Les anecdotes de la Shadows Draconis

description.fr: Salutations jeunes lecteurs et lectrices parvenus dans nos contrées par curiosité. Si certains parmi vous sauront de quoi je parle d'autres non. Alors allez lire "Akuyaku reijou no shitsuji sama drapeau hametsu wa ore ga tsubusasete itadakimasu" car ici n'est à lire que le concentré des chaps bonus pour les rares affamés, lecteurs de ces chapitres. Le spoil, c'est le mal. Alors gardez-vous si vous n'avez pas lu l'œuvre. (Comparer au reste des œuvres où l'on sort un chap par mois. Ici sera publié 1 chapitre tous les deux semaines) Bien à vous et bonne lecture

title.en: The Evil God Descends, I Own Great Hell

altTitles.zh: 邪神降世，我有一座大凶狱

description.en:
In the apocalypse, an evil god descends, devouring humans and threatening my homeland, China! Little do they know, I hold the control of the Demon-Suppressing Hell, where countless gods and ancient monsters from China have been secretly imprisoned for thousands of years! All for this moment... to annihilate the foreign gods and cleanse the human world!

— Of course, if you surrender, as the Warden, I might consider letting you evil gods into the Great Hell to work on sewing machines. Meals and accommodation are provided, of course.

title.en: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi wa Mujikaku ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku no Shugoryuu) to Issho ni Henkyou de Shiawase ni Kurashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師は無自覚に伝説となる ヤンデレ妹（王国の守護竜）と一緒に辺境で幸せに暮らします！

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Unwittingly Becomes a Legend Living Happily on the Frontier with his Yandere Sister (The Guardian Dragon of the Kingdom)!

description.en:
One day, Mys, the eldest son of Duke Windsor, is sentenced by the king to be exiled to the border. The king claims that his secret visit to Valitra, the strongest dragon that protects the kingdom, is an attempt at treason against the kingdom. However, Valitra's guardian dragon is actually Mys' younger sister, Tinny, who was thought to have died four years ago! 

"Mys Nii-sama is the one who saved my life, the one who is worthy to rule everything in the world [Supreme Being]. Anyone who hurts Mys Nii-sama will be thrown into hell!" 

And the Kingdom is heading towards destruction, having incurred the wrath of its guardian dragon, Valitra... Meanwhile, on the border where Mys has become the ruler, his alchemy techniques are leading to unprecedented developments and making everyone happy - and once again, the kingdom is in danger of destruction.
description.id: Suatu hari, Mys, putra tertua dari Duke Windsor, dijatuhi hukuman oleh raja untuk diasingkan ke perbatasan. Raja mengklaim bahwa kunjungan rahasianya ke Valitra, naga terkuat yang melindungi kerajaan, merupakan usaha pengkhianatan terhadap kerajaan. Namun, naga penjaga Valitra sebenarnya adalah adiknya Meis, Tinny, yang dikira telah meninggal empat tahun lalu! “Mys Nii-sama adalah orang yang menyelamatkan hidupku, orang yang layak untuk memerintah segala sesuatu di dunia [Makhluk Tertinggi]. Siapapun yang menyakiti Mys Nii-sama akan ku lemparkan ke dalam neraka!” Dan Kerajaan sedang menuju kehancuran, setelah menimbulkan kemarahan naga pelindungnya, Valitra… Sementara itu, di perbatasan di mana Mys telah menjadi penguasa, teknik alkemisnya mengarah pada perkembangan yang belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya dan membuat semua orang bahagia – dan sekali lagi, kerajaan berada dalam bahaya kehancuran.
description.ja: まともな回復薬すら作れないことから、家族から無能扱いされていたウィンザー公爵家の長男・マイス。彼はある日、国王から辺境ベオグラードへの追放を言い渡されてしまう。王国を守るドラゴン【守護竜ヴァリトラ】のもとへ通っていたことが、王国への反逆に当たるというのだ。しかし実は、守護竜ヴァリトラの正体は4年前に死んだと思われていたマイスの妹ティニーであった――。「マイス兄様こそ私の命の恩人にして、この世のすべてを統べるに相応しい【至高にして至大であられるお方】です。マイス兄様を傷つける者は、この私が地獄に叩き落します！」

altTitles.ja: 刃牙らへん

description.en: Following his battle with Nomi no Sukune the 2nd, Baki's half-brother, Jack Hanma challenges the warriors of the underground arena to take on his original fighting style of "Goudou": The way of Biting! Fascinated by Jack's relentless pursuit of more strength, the warriors clash against Jack and his fearsome style. Just what will be the outcome of this blood-ridden contest of purity?
description.ru: Продолжение великой эпопеи "Баки". 6-я номерная серия тайтла, которая поведает нам нереальную историю сражения Джека Хаммера и доисторического человека Пикла!!!
description.tr: Büyük destan Bucky'nin devamı. Jack Hammer ve tarih öncesi adam Pickle arasındaki savaşın gerçek dışı hikayesini anlatacak olan Baki'nin 6 numaralı serisidir!!!
description.pt-br: Jack derrubou o mundo do sumô, agora ele irá desafiar a todos para seu torneio. Desta vez uma nova jornada.

title.en: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja: 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい

altTitles.ja-ro: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.zh: 一觉醒来坐拥神装和飞船，我决定以买一套独门独户的房子为目标作为佣兵自由地活下去

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.ru: Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Space Mercenary: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship!

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
description.ja: 目が覚めたら、いきなり宇宙船の中だった。どうやら自分がドハマりしていたゲームに酷似した世界のようだ。幸い、愛用の宇宙船が一機ある。これなら傭兵家業で金には困らないし、ひなびた惑星に家でも買ってのんびり暮らすか！……と思っていた矢先に、無一文の美少女が転がり込んできて――。
description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

altTitles.ja: おやすみモラトリアム

altTitles.en: The Best Medical God in the City

altTitles.ja: 一族を滅ぼされた俺が最強の力を手に入れて帰ってきた

description.en:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

title.en: Kuromaku Ikka ni Tensei Shita Kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru

altTitles.ja: 黒幕一家に転生したけど原作無視して独立する

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Into a Villainous Family, but I'm Ignoring the Plot and Going Rogue!
I Was Reincarnated Into a Villainous Family, but I'll Ignore the Original Story and Live Independently

description.en:
The protagonist, who has been reincarnated into the world of a game he played extensively, has become Yuri, the third son of a villainous family!!

His father, siblings, and the entire household are the worst and most ruthless, all doomed to be brutally massacred.
As for Yuri himself, he is destined to betray the Hero as the final boss, dragging the heroine down with him to meet the worst possible death.

Not wanting to die, he decides to completely distance himself from both his villainous family and the Hero’s party, intending to live a peaceful and carefree life… Or so he thought, but now, one by one, the original story’s characters keep gathering around him…!?

From a self-declared "exile", the lone Final Boss’s journey of independence and unrivaled strength begins!!!

___
* Alternative Raw: [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71281)
description.ja:
やり込んだゲームの世界に転生した主人公は
黒幕ファミリーの三男・ユーリになっていた！！

父や兄姉ともに最悪＆最凶の一家は、いずれ惨殺される運命。
ユーリに至ってはラスボスとして勇者を裏切り、ヒロインを道連れにして最悪の死に方をする。

死ぬのはごめんなので、黒幕一家とも勇者パーティーとも無関係に、ぬくぬく暮らす…
はずなのに、原作キャラたちがどんどん俺のもとに集まってくるんだが…!?

自主的『追放』宣言から始まる
はぐれラスボスの独立無双譚、スタート！！！

altTitles.zh: 长官！本次战场是这里吗？

description.en:
As a successful captain in the military, Lee Yoon-ah is an icon of success and power.  But after an accident on the battlefield, she finds herself trapped in a romantic fantasy novel!

Stuck in a supporting role as the best friend to the main protagonist, Yoon-ah is determined to overturn the plotline and change Rosalie’s fate. Will she be able to change Rosalie’s fate and find happiness in the new world? 

Will she return to where she was originally from?
description.fr:
Lee Yoon-Ah, capitaine d'une unité des forces spéciales, considérée comme la meilleure de Corée.

En tant que soldat, il n’y avait pas de romance dans sa vie. Cependant, un monde complètement différent se déroule devant elle, après avoir perdue sa tête à cause d'un bombardement lors de son expédition à l’étranger.

Elle se retrouve dans un roman d’amour fantastique écrit par son ami !
Elle devient alors « Rosalie », une femme qui vit une vie misérable.

Prenant une profonde respiration et se tenant la tête un moment, elle décida de changer sa vie, considérant cet endroit comme un nouveau champ de bataille.

« C’est une société hiérarchique, et j’ai suffisamment vécue dans une société hiérarchique appelée l’armée que j'en ai marre. »
« Désobéissez-vous à mes ordres maintenant ? »

Elle rencontre alors un homme possédant un charisme absolu !
Mais involontairement, une romance s'installe...

« Duchesse, que pensez-vous de faire agenouiller le prince héritier ? »
« C’est la première fois que je m'agenouille devant quelqu’un d’autre que l’empereur. »

Le personnage masculin original se met à genoux, et non pour l'héroïne.
L'ancienne capitaine, qui ne se soucie pas de l’amour, pourra-t-elle gagner cette bataille ?
description.pt-br: Capitão das Forças Especiais de Elite Lee Yoon-ah, que dizem ser o nerd da Coreia. Como soldado até os ossos, não havia romance em sua vida. No entanto, um mundo completamente diferente se desenrola diante dela, que enlouqueceu após ser atingida por um projétil enquanto era despachada para o exterior. Ser possuído por um romance de fantasia escrito por um amigo! Ela também se torna uma 'Rosalie' extra que vive uma vida miserável. Respirando fundo e balançando a cabeça por um momento, ela considera isso um campo de batalha e decide mudar de vida. “Esta é uma sociedade de classes.” “Porque já experimentei o suficiente para me cansar de uma sociedade hierárquica chamada militar.” "Você está desobedecendo minhas ordens agora?" Capitão que conquista o duque com carisma absoluto! No entanto, ela involuntariamente agarra o romance ... “Duke, como é se ajoelhar para o príncipe herdeiro? É a primeira vez que você se ajoelha diante de alguém que não seja o imperador. O protagonista masculino original, não o protagonista feminino, cai de joelhos. Capitão, que não se importava com o amor, você pode vencer este campo de batalha?

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

description.fr:
Avec le cœur tremblant, il s’est présenté au rendez-vous arrangé tout en dissimulant sa véritable identité.

“Voici mon grand-père, mon père, ma mère, mon grand frère et mon oncle !”

Pourquoi, bon sang, tous ces foutus héros sont-ils rassemblés devant moi ?!

Il s’avère que la famille de ma petite amie est une lignée de héros parmi les plus puissants ?!

An Jae-rim, un vilain connu sous le nom de “Exécuteur”, tente de jouer le rôle du gendre parfait tout en cachant sa véritable identité et en essayant de se débarrasser de sa belle-famille. Mais ce n’est pas aussi simple qu’il le pensait !

Pour couronner le tout, ils me prennent pour un aspirant héros alors que je suis un méchant !

Une comédie d’action hilarante pleine de tension et de rebondissements !

title.en: The Errand Princess of the Inner Palace

altTitles.ja: 後宮の雑用姫

description.en:
Shaolan (Xiao Lian) is an orphaned girl who lives alone in the mountains at the very nook of an impoverished village. One day, an envoy from the palace arrives and scouts her to to be a lady-in-waiting for the imperial harem. This was how a wild girl raised on the mountains was able to live in a luxurious palace working as a lady-in-waiting, however...

On her first day (due to various reasons), Shaolan had suddenly become a criminal after slapping one of the consorts.

Though execution appeared certain, she was specially pardoned and demoted from a lady-in-waiting to a maidservant in charge of odd jobs. She is ridiculed by the other consorts as the, "Princess of Odd Jobs," however, this is where her rapid advance begins. She implements reforms to the worn-down palace and optimizes her chores through the knowledge she learned from her life of living in poverty, earning the gaze of the other ladies-in-waiting and the imperial consorts alike. Continuing these course of events, Shaolan's name spreads through the imperial palace, reaching even the emperor's ears...

altTitles.ja: ワンフォーオール

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

title.en: A Red Laurel To My Emperor

altTitles.zh-hk: 為我的皇帝獻上紅月桂花

altTitles.en: Red Laurel Flowers to My Emperor

description.en: Laurel Neales, the first princess of Tortia, has been married off to the emperor of Kairos following a political feud that ended with the assassination of her parents. Undiscouraged by the circumstances, Laurel refuses to give in to becoming yet another of the emperor's concubines. Instead, she plays along with his romantic whims and gains her own form of power in this new life by proposing an offer he cannot refuse: to facilitate his conquest of the land that betrayed her.

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en: Monica Everett is revered as "The Silent Witch." She's the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she's just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the "Seven Sages," and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?
description.ja: 〈沈黙の魔女〉モニカ・エヴァレット。無詠唱魔術を使える世界唯一の若き魔術師………だがその本性は――超がつく人見知り！！無詠唱魔術を練習したのも人前で喋らなくて良いようにするためだった！才能に無自覚なまま“七賢人”に選ばれてしまったモニカは、同僚ルイスから第二王子を護衛する極秘任務を押しつけられて……？引きこもり天才魔女が正体を隠し、学園へ潜り込む！人見知りモニカは果たしてどうなる――！？

altTitles.ja: 水姫先輩の恋占い

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

altTitles.ja: ビリーバット

altTitles.th: บิลลี่ แบ็ท

description.en:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo…
description.pl: "Billy Bat" przedstawia losy japońsko-amerykańskiego artysty Kevina Yamagaty, autora mangi o identycznym tytule co dzieło, w którym sam występuje, czyli "Billy Bat". Pracuje dla wydawnictwa "Marble Comics". Pewnego dnia do jego mieszkania pukają dwaj detektywi wyglądający jak Laurel Hardy z "Dick Tracy". Informują go, że otrzymali od gospodarza zezwolenie na przeprowadzenie śledztwa sąsiadującego budynku. Wkrótce jeden z detektywów, chudzielec Laurel, zauważa prace Kevina i okazuje się fanem "Billy'ego Bata", podczas gdy otyły Hardy podnosi pojedynczą stronę ze stwierdzeniem, iż komiks wygląda zadziwiająco podobnie do mangi publikowanej niegdyś przez Jumpa. Oskarża bohatera o kradzież tokijskiego dzieła z 1949 roku.
description.es-la:
Billy Bat es un cómic en un cómic y el verdadero protagonista es un artista japonés-americano llamado Kevin Yamagata que dibuja a Billy Bat para "Marble Comics". Poco después pasan al artista en su estudio con su ayudante, dos detectives reales que parecen Laurel y Hardy con trajes y gabardinas de la época de Dick Tracy, llaman a la puerta y se apropian de la habitación de Kevin con el fin de realizar una vigilancia en una habitación de un edificio adyacente. 

Uno de los detectives, el flaco "Laurel", ve el trabajo de Kevin y resulta que es un fanático de Billy Bat. El otro detective, el regordete "Hardy", coge una página diciendo que los personajes le resultan familiares y acusa a Kevin de traducir un viejo cómic "japonés".  
Mientras Hardy recuerda el cómic que cree que Kevin está copiando, hacemos otro salto temporal Urasawaesco al Tokio de 1949...
description.pt-br: Um detetive particular, é o protagonista da história em quadrinhos feita por Kevin Yamagata, um quadrinista americano, descendente de japoneses, famoso por sua história “Billy Bat”. O cotidiano de Kevin é abruptamente ado quando dois detetives entram no estúdio dele, a fim de investigar um vizinho acusado de espionagem. Um desses detetives vê o personagem Billy Bat e diz ter visto aquele desenho enquanto trabalhava no Japão. Suspeitando ter visto o personagem enquanto morava lá e o roubado inconscientemente, Kevin regressa ao Japão para buscar a verdade.

description.en: The fun and marvelous daily life of a young couple after meeting mysterious children who found their way to them.
description.ko:
숲속의 젊은 부부와 어느 날 그들에게 찾아온
정체불명의 아이들이 만들어가는 즐겁고 신묘한 일상
description.zh:
渴望拥有孩子的年轻夫妇，
突降长着老虎耳朵的萌娃！
很久以前在一座村庄里，从小青梅竹马的他们长大后顺理成章结为了夫妇。但结婚多年却一直没有孩子，尝试了各种“良药”后无果，最终找到了隔壁村传闻很厉害的神算子告诉他们需要搬家到山林里。某天突然家里出来了两个来历不明的小孩！好像还长着老虎的耳朵和尾巴？！

---

---

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Danshi Kinsei Majo no Kuni ni Nyotaika Skill de Nyuukoku shite mita

altTitles.ja: 男子禁制魔女の国に女体化スキルで入国してみた

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Kinsei Majo no Kuni ni Nyotaika Skill de Nyuukoku shite mita

altTitles.en: Using Feminization Skills to Enter The Land of Witches, Where Men are Forbidden

altTitles.zh: 试着使用女体化技能进入禁止男人的魔女国度

description.en: "I sneaked into the witch's land, where men are forbidden, using feminization magic!" A guy gets hit by a truck after saving a girl, and gets sent into another world. Unlike other protagonists who get insane cheat skills, he gets a skill that allows him to transform into a girl instead.
description.ja: 「絶対にバレてはいけない。僕が“男”だということを……」　魔女の国。そこは絶対男子禁制の女性だけが入国を許される花園。男子が王都に立ち入れば、即極刑！　そんな王都にある、魔女学園の門を叩く者がいた。名はトワ・ミツミネ。異世界転生してきた男子高校生である。もちろん男のトワには王都に入ることはできないはずだった。しかし、トワは異世界転生時にとあるスキルを手に入れた。それは、“普通の”最強スキルではなく――女の子に変身できる“女体化”スキルだった。しかも女体化状態なら超強力な魔法も使えるようで……！　元男子高校生には刺激的過ぎる女の子しかいない学園生活！　憧れの『最強魔女騎士』めざし、トワのちょっとえっちな女体化ファンタジーライフが始まる！

description.en: Dungeon Descends! Luck is My Greatest Weapon How a Critically Lucky Assassin Elegantly Clears Dungeons Wealth and Freedom Through Luck—A Perfect Life Begins? My Evolution Skill is the Seven Deadly Sins?!

title.en: Steins;Gate - Rebellion of the Missing Ring

altTitles.ja: STEINS;GATE 亡環のリベリオン

description.en:
This is an original story expanded from the STEINS;GATE game, and focusing on the heroine Amane Suzuha. In 2036, a monopoly on time machines has created world peace, but at the cost of human liberty.  
  
Suzuha has followed in her late father's footsteps in fighting alongside the Valkyrie rebellion force to change the world. After the group fails on a major mission, Suzuha has almost no hope left. But then she discovers that her father left something for her: a time machine. Using this, maybe Suzuha will have the power to finally destroy this dystopian society and create a better present and future!  
  
Part of [Steins;Gate](https://mangadex.com/?page=search&title=Steins%3BGate) series.

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

description.en: Molly, a cute 13-year-old girl, has been bullied by ruffians ever since she was little. Determined never to be harassed again, she gets herself into an elite school – a place free from hooligans and gangsters, or so she thinks! It isn't long before she finds herself the lackey of a mysterious boy in black – a gangster belonging to a pre-eminent gang in the underworld! An action-packed tale peppered with budding romance...
description.uk: Моллі, мила 13-річна дівчинка, яка з дитинства зазнавала знущань з боку хуліганів. Вирішивши ніколи більше не бути переслідуваною, вона потрапляє в елітну школу – місце, вільне від хуліганів і гангстерів, принаймні їй так здається! Невдовзі вона стає слугою таємничого хлопця в чорному – гангстера, який належить до видатної банди злочинного світу! Наповнена гострим сюжетом історія, приправлена романтикою...

title.en: Gal to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ギャルと委員長が偶然再会する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story about a Gal and a Committee Chairwoman Who Meet Again by Coincidence

altTitles.pt-br: A história de uma gal e uma presidente de comitê que se reencontram por acaso

altTitles.es: Una historia sobre una gal y una presidenta de comité que se reencuentran por coincidencia

description.en: After finishing her errands, Marina heads for the bus stop on her way home. However, there she runs into the drunken former committee chairwoman from her high school days. She thinks she doesn't remember her, but while she's taking care of her, she says to her, "You used to avoid me...," which is very meaningful to her...?

altTitles.en: I Became a Legendary Archmage by Reading a Book

altTitles.pt-br: Me Tornei uma Arquimaga Lendária ao Ler um Livro

description.en:
I was reincarnated as a grimoire containing all the magical knowledge of another world.

Anyone who reads me can become a legendary archmage.

Please, just read me...
But no one is willing to open my pages.

altTitles.ja: 機動絶記ガンダム SEQUEL

altTitles.vi: Cơ Động Tuyệt Kí Gundam Sequel

description.en: It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam, which had protected the Earth during the Great War, was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world, there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: ガールズ×ヴァンパイア

description.en: **Alt Official Raw:** [note](https://note.com/girls_vampire)

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.ja: Clevatess -Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha-

altTitles.ja: クレバテス－魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者－
Clevatess -The King of Devil Beast, The baby, and The Brave of Undead-

altTitles.en: Clevatess -The Devil Beast King, The Baby, & The Corpse Hero-
Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king.
Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.

Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

title.en: Becoming a God, Starting as water monkey

description.en: The protagonist, Liang, transmigrates to a world called the Great Wilderness. He was In a desperate situation, he accidentally awakens a system called the “Ze Bloodline System,” and everything changes from that moment! By infusing himself with the bloodlines of ancient divine beasts, the protagonist is able to gain immense power while gradually refining his own godly talents. Come! Fuse with the Ze Spirit bloodline!!! System: “Awakened bloodline—Water Monkey.” Protagonist: “???”

altTitles.ja: 魔法のつかいかた

description.en: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Kouei: Meikyuukoku no Shinjin Tansakusha

altTitles.fr: L'arrière-garde la plus forte du monde - L'explorateur novice du pays du labyrinthe

altTitles.en: World Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country and Dungeon Seekers
World's Strongest Rearguard - The Novice Seeker of Labyrinth Country

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный в мире Заступник – Страна лабиринта и искатели приключений

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の後衛
世界最強の後衛 ～迷宮国の新人探索者～

altTitles.zh-hk: 世界最強後衛～迷宮國的新人探索者～

altTitles.en: The World's Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country's Novice Seeker

altTitles.zh: 世界最强后卫~迷宫国的新人探索者~

description.en:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. 


In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. 

And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".
description.ru:
Главный герой — трудоголик с большим стажем, он и его босс попадают в аварию, после чего они обнаруживают, что переместились в другой мир. Главный герой не хочет оставаться с начальницей, решая отправиться на приключения в одиночестве. Куда же его приведут эти странствия и встретятся ли они вновь?..   


---

**Links:** [Alternate Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF00000068010000_68/)

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...
description.uk:
Після поразки та полону, вбивця драконів Леон потрапив у полон до королеви клану Срібних Драконів. Усвідомлюючи наближення смерті, він використав заборонену техніку, щоб накласти прокляття на королеву, але несподівано королева втратила контроль.

Він думав, що це змусить королеву жити з соромом до кінця життя, і це буде гідно титулу вбивці драконів.

Але через два роки, коли Леон розплющив очі, поруч з ним сиділа дівчинка-дракон із хвостиком...

Qiao An, a student from the Battle Armor Academy’s elite class, failed the battle armor qualification test and was downgraded to the outer department's logistics class. In the post-apocalyptic world, three centuries after the fall of humanity, Qiao An, burdened with massive debt, unexpectedly discovers that he has already formed contracts with not just one, but multiple top-tier battle armors.




"Black or white, which do you choose?"

"I want both!"




With the strongest battle armors, making money becomes a piece of cake.

"Save the world? Not interested, doesn't concern me."

"What? All my debts cleared? Hey, wait a minute!"

description.en: When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story's most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!
description.ja: 普通の大学生、平沢一希は気が付くと自身がやり込んだゲーム『Brave Hearts』の悪役キャラ、ハロルド・ストークスに憑依していた。 このままゲームのシナリオが消化されていくといずれ主人公たちに倒され死んでしまう！？ 作中でも屈指の強さを誇るハロルドの肉体とゲームの 知識で盛りだくさんの死亡フラグを回避してつかみ取れるか生存ルート！？

description.en:
Yuuchi is a girl who has a passion for art…. or rather, HAD a passion for art. Because of her mother's disapproval, Yuuchi had to give up painting. Still, she had made a promise to her baseball-loving friend, Natsu, that she'd paint a picture of him. Having given up on her dreams, Yuuchi now must find the "hope" within herself to continue.  
  
(Source: Intercross)

altTitles.ja: タイヨウのうた

description.en: Sixteen-year old Kaoru, who cannot be exposed to sunlight, can only experience “life” at night, when she’s in front of the train station, singing. There begins a love that has blossomed for the first time in her life.

altTitles.es-la: Llora, aunque es mejor si suplicas

description.en: Orphaned at a young age, Layla Llewellyn feels like the luckiest girl in the world after she moves in with her uncle Bill, a gardener who lives on the scenic Arvis estate in the Berg Empire. To Layla, Arvis seems like paradise; she loves to explore the vast forest, always bringing her notebook to record the wildlife she encounters. She especially loves the birds, watching them with awe as they hatch and grow from fluffy chicks into beautiful birds. Duke Herhardt, the young, handsome lord of Arvis, is also interested in birds-and in Layla. But the difference is, he’s interested in birds because he likes to hunt them… and he’s interested in Layla because he likes to make her cry. If a lovely bird is trapped in a golden cage, which will she choose: a life of luxury, or freedom? (Source: kaiscans.com)
description.fr:
Orpheline depuis son plus jeune âge, Layla Llewellyn a l'impression d'être la fille la plus chanceuse du monde lorsqu'elle emménage chez son oncle Bill, un jardinier qui vit dans le magnifique domaine d'Arvis, dans l'empire Berg. 

Pour Layla, Arvis ressemble à un paradis ; elle adore explorer la vaste forêt, toujours munie de son carnet de notes pour noter la faune et la flore qu'elle rencontre. Elle aime tout particulièrement les oiseaux, qu'elle observe avec émerveillement au moment de l'éclosion et de la croissance des poussins duveteux qui deviennent de magnifiques oiseaux. 

Le duc Herhardt, le jeune et beau seigneur d'Arvis, s'intéresse également aux oiseaux et à Layla. Mais la différence, c'est qu'il s'intéresse aux oiseaux parce qu'il aime les chasser... et qu'il s'intéresse à Layla parce qu'il aime la faire pleurer. 

Si un bel oiseau est prisonnier d'une cage dorée, que choisira-t-il : une vie de luxe ou la liberté ?

description.cs:
Krásná Athanasia byla zabita rukou svého biologického otce, chladnokrevného císaře Clauda de Alger Obelia! Je to jen hloupá pohádka na dobrou noc... dokud se jedna žena neprobudí a náhle nezjistí, že se stala onou nešťastnou princeznou! Potřebuje plán, jak přežít svůj odsouzený osud, a čas se krátí. Bude se řídit plánem A, žít co nejtišeji, aniž by si jí všiml nechvalně proslulý císař? Plán B, shromáždit dostatek peněz na útěk z paláce? Nebo jí zůstane plán C, sladkými řečičkami se dostat do otcovy přízně?!

description.de:
Wiedergeboren in einer Welt voller magischer Kräfte und als Tochter des Kaisers! Besser hätte es Athanasia kaum treffen können. Wäre nicht der Kaiser ein grausamer Tyrann, der sein Kind ablehnt und vernachlässigt. Noch als Baby wird Athanasia bewusst, dass in ihrem neuen Leben etwas ganz und gar nicht stimmt! Wenn sie nicht eine Überlebensstrategie entwickelt, wird sie an ihrem 18. Geburtstag auf Geheiß ihres eigenen Vaters sterben. So weit darf es nicht kommen. Also macht sich Athanasia daran ihr Schicksal zu verändern...

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  

"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?"

Without a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?

"I… What should I do…"

---
The beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. 

Will she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!

description.fa:
آتاناسیا‌ی زیبا در سن ۱۸ سالگی به دست پدر خودش به قتل میرسه، کلود دِ الگر اوبلیا، یه امپراطور بی احساس! این فقط ی داستان شب بچگونس... تا اینکه دختره از خواب بیدار شد و فهمید به یه شاهزاده بدبخت تبدیل شده! اون برای زنده موندن از دست سرنوشتش به نقشه نیاز داشت، و یکمم زمان برای فرار. بنظرتون اون میتونه با نقشه A راحت زندگی کنه بدون اینکه مورد توجه امپراطور قرار بگیره؟ یا نقشه B، که میخواد پول کافی جمع کنه و بعدش بزنه به چاک؟ یاعم نقشه C؟ با شیرین زبونی و کاوایی بودن خودشو تو دل پدرش جا کنه؟!

description.fr:
Areu Areu, je dois sauver ma vie! Quand cette femme se réveille dans le corps d'une princesse, elle comprend vite qu’elle n’est pas devenu n’importe qui. Elle est Athanasia, célèbre héroïne de roman, qui meurt à 18 ans entre les mains de son impitoyable père, l'Empereur Obelia (Claude, pour les intimes). Elle n'a donc que quelques années devant elle pour changer le cours du destin. Evidemment, le plus simple serait de réussir à amadouer ce père qui la déteste. A moins de s'enfuir? Bon, pour cela il faudra déjà marcher plus vite qu'à quatre pattes!!

description.id:
Athanasia yang cantik terbunuh di tangan ayah kandungnya sendiri, Claude de Alger Obelia, kaisar berdarah dingin! Itu hanya cerita pengantar tidur yang konyol ... sampai seorang wanita bangun dan tiba-tiba menemukan dia menjadi putri yang malang itu! Dia membutuhkan rencana untuk bertahan dari nasibnya yang terkutuk, dan waktu hampir habis. Akankah dia pergi dengan Rencana A, hidup setenang mungkin tanpa diketahui oleh kaisar yang terkenal itu? Rencana B, kumpulkan cukup uang untuk kabur dari istana? Atau akankah dia terjebak dengan Rencana C, berbicara manis tentang kebaikan ayahnya?!

description.it:
La bella Athanasia fu uccisa per mano del suo stesso padre biologico, Claude de Alger Obelia, l'imperatore a sangue freddo! E' solo una sciocca storia della buonanotte... Fino a quando una donna si sveglia e scopre all'improvviso di essere diventata quella sfortunata principessa! Ha bisogno di un piano per sopravvivere al suo destino condannato, e il tempo sta per scadere. Sarà lei andare con il piano. A, vivere il più silenziosamente possibile senza essere notato dal famigerato imperatore? Piano B, raccogliere abbastanza soldi per sfuggire al palazzo? O lei sarà bloccata con il piano. C, parlare dolcemente percorrendo la strada per aggraziarsi il padre?

---

description.ja:
目を覚ましたらとあるネット小説の脇役姫、「アタナシア」というお姫様に転生していた。
しかし、アタナシアは父親の皇帝・クロードに見捨てられた姫で、周囲にも冷たく扱われている。
小説の中では、妹で主人公姫のジェニットに毒を盛った濡れ衣を着せられ、
１８歳の誕生日にクロードに殺されてしまう運命のアタナシア。
なんとしても死亡エンドを回避するため、お城を出る準備をこっそり進めていたアタナシアは、
ある日クロードの住む宮に入ってしまい――？

description.ko:
어느 날 눈을 떠보니 공주님이 되었다!

금수저를 입에 물고 태어난 건 좋은데,
하필이면 친아버지의 손에 죽는 비운의 공주라니!

피도 눈물도 없는 냉혈한 황제 클로드!
죽고 싶지 않다면 그의 눈에 띄어서는 안 된다.
그런데,

“언제부터 내 성에 이런 버러지가 살았지?”

황제의 눈에 띄어버린 아타나시아.
과연 그녀는 살아남을 수 있을까?

“나…… 어떡하지……?”

description.pl:
Piękna Athanasia została zabita przez własnego biologicznego ojca, Claude de Alger Obelia, zimnokrwistego władcę! To zwykła, głupiutka historia do łóżka... do czasu, aż pewna kobieta budzi się i odkrywa, iż jest tą nieszczęsną księżniczką! Potrzebuje planu, by przetrwać w wskazanej przyszłości, gdy czas ucieka. Pójdzie w ślady Planu A, żyć tak cicho jak to jest możliwe bez zauważenia przez niesławnego władcę? Plan B, zebrać wystarczająco pieniędzy żeby uciec z pałacu? Lub może utknie w Planie C, by słodką gadką wkupić się w łaski swego ojca?!

---

description.ru:
Когда я открыла глаза, то стала принцессой. Но почему из всех персонажей этой истории именно принцессой, судьба которой тесно переплетена с кровавым Императором? Если я хочу выжить, то должна быть неприметной для его глаз. «Когда это в моём дворце начали жить ничтожные людишки?». Человек, у которого нет ни капли сочувствия, ни слезинки — этот холодный император Клод! Неужели Атанасия, пойманная императором, сможет выжить? «Что… Что мне делать?..»

description.uk:
Прекрасна Атанасія загинула від рук власного батька, холоднокровного імператора Клода де Альджео Обелія. Це була просто дурнувата історія, щоб почитати перед сном… поки одна жінка не прокинулась у тілі той бідолашної принцеси! Їй потрібен план, щоб уникнути лихої долі, а час уже спливає. Чи слідуватиме вона плану А, і житиме тихо, не привертаючи уваги сумнозвісного імператора? Чи обере план B: зібрати побільше грошей і втекти з палацу? Чи застрягне на плані C, солодкими словами, добиваючись батьківської турботи.

---

description.zh:
某天醒来,我竟然变成了公主! 而且还是死在自己亲生父亲手里的悲催公主! 铁石心肠的冷血皇帝，如果不想死的话， 就不要在他面前晃悠！ 但是，"我的王城里什么时候有虫子了?" 最终还是被他注意到了，我能活下来吗? 我该怎么办？！

description.zh-hk:
某天一覺醒來發現自己變成了公主! 含著金湯匙出生是很好啦～ 但怎麼偏偏是注定被親生父親殺掉的悲情公主呢？ ​ 沒血沒淚的殘忍皇帝克洛德! 想活下去就不能被他注意到。 然而， ​ 「我的城裡什麼時候住了這種蟲子?」 ​ 被皇帝注意到的阿塔娜西亞。 究竟能不能存活下來呢? ​ 「我……該怎麼辦……?」
